name: zoxide-git-projects
title: Zoxide Git Projects

author: theherk

commands.name: find
commands.title: Zoxide Git Projects
commands.description: Find and open Git projects using zoxide

preferences.name: cacheTimeout
preferences.title: Cache Timeout
preferences.description: How long to cache the project list in seconds (0 to disable)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
